#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<string>
#include<string.h>
#include<algorithm>
#define PI acos(-1.0)
#define SZ 100007
#define Fi(a,n) for(int i=a;i<n;i++)
#define Fj(a,n) for(int j=a;j<n;j++)
#define Fk(a,n) for(int k=a;k<n;k++)
#define ri(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define pb push_back
#define SZ 4000007
using namespace std;
typedef vector<int> vi;

int pre[SZ];
char line[SZ];
int main()
{

    while(scanf("%s",line))
    {
        int len = strlen(line), k;
        if(len==3 && line[0]=='E' && line[1]=='n' && line[2]=='d')
           break;
        pre[1] = 0;
        printf("0%c",len==1?'\n':' ');
        Fi(2,len+1)
        {
            k = pre[i-1];
            while(k!=0 && line[k]!=line[i-1])
                k = pre[k];
            if(line[k]==line[i-1])
                pre[i] = k+1;
            else
                pre[i] = 0;
            printf("%d%c",pre[i],i+1<len+1?' ':'\n');
        }
    }
	return 0;
}
